plot: Miss Von Trump plays a girl who is distressed by a bully, Mr. Richardson. She helps a wandering gypsy. A lone prospector also helps the gypsy. This gypsy in return brings the hero to discomfort the villain and starts a love story.
title: The Wandering Gypsy
plot_es: Miss Von Trump plays a girl who is distressed by a bully, Mr. Richardson. She helps a wandering gypsy. A lone prospector also helps the gypsy. This gypsy in return brings the hero to discomfort the villain and starts a love story.
plot_en: Miss Von Trump plays a girl who is distressed by a bully, Mr. Richardson. She helps a wandering gypsy. A lone prospector also helps the gypsy. This gypsy in return brings the hero to discomfort the villain and starts a love story.
